improvements: Slightly reduce contrast to reveal details in shadows
Apply a subtle vignette to emphasize the central subjects
Adjust white balance to slightly warmer tones
critiques.notes: The silhouette effect is interesting, but the image is underexposed, obscuring potentially compelling details. Increasing brightness and reducing contrast will help reveal those details.

improvements: enhance contrast to bring out details in the sky
crop to focus on the silhouette, placing it in the right third following the rule of thirds
critiques.notes: The silhouette and the flag create a dramatic image, but overall the photo is too dark. Improving brightness and contrast will enhance the visibility of key elements and add depth. Cropping will create a more balanced composition.
